title: Angular Course for Beginner
details: Angular is a powerful platform that allows you to build web applications. It includes a component based framework for making applications scalable and a library collection with a wide range of development features. A suite of developer tools gives you the ability to manage your application at every stage of development, from conception to testing. Udemy offers a range of Angular courses to teach the basics or enhance your skill level.

title: Vue.js Course for Beginner
details: Vue.js is a JavaScript framework that is widely popular because it is easy to learn and use. Originally designed to create applications and web interfaces for a single page, Vue is now capable of building web and desktop apps. Use it to develop mobile apps with help from the Electron framework. Over a million learners have explored this exciting platform with a Vue.js course on Udemy, and you can too, no matter your skill level.
